alert.note: Alert for Chenango (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:35AM EST until December 20 at 2:12AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York... Chenango River At Sherburne affecting Chenango County. Chenango River At Chenango Forks affecting Broome County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chenango River at Sherburne. * WHEN...From this morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, About 2 feet of water covers north Main Street, Knapp Street, and Gould Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:02 AM EST Monday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:02 AM EST Monday was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM EST.
